default_message.message:
Structured Start Tab

Introduction

Hello!

You have just installed Structured Start Tab, a tool for organising links so they are easy to find and use whenever a new browser tab is opened. You can fill this page with links and they'll be there every time you open a new tab. If you add panels they will give the page structure. Links and panels can me moved around by dragging.

At the side of the page is a toolbar, with buttons for adding links and panels, these can be clicked or dragged onto the page. You can also open the options page and see what's in the trash. Recent bookmarks can also be seen in this bar. Bookmarks can be dragged into the page and permanently organised like any other link.

Try it now - double click on the 'Example' section (below) to open it and see some pre-organised links. Next time you open a tab, it should look exactly the same as this one, with the same sections open, and all the same links.

When you've got the hang of it, fold this message away by double clicking on 'Introduction' at the top of this section. When it's no longer needed, you can drag the whole section to the Trash.

Finally, thanks for using this, I hope it's as useful for you as it is for me. If you can help make it better with suggestions for features, bug reports, or contributions of code, please do. If you like it, please rate it on the app-store-thingy so more people might give it a try.

Summary

  • Open links with a click.
  • Edit links and sections with a shift-click.
  • Fold sections with a double-click.
  • Organise by dragging.
  • Undo the last operation with Ctrl+Z.
  • Toggle sidebar with Ctrl+Shift+B.
  • Show the click heatmap with Ctrl+Shift+I.

data_info_add_link.message: Add link|New link: click or drag.

data_info_add_panel.message: Add panel|New panel: click or drag.

data_info_trash.message: Trash|Click to toggle the trash section open or closed.  Drag links or panels here to move them to the trash.

locked.message:
Page locked.

Unlock it in the options page.

add_link.message:
Adding a link….

Drop anywhere in the page to add it, or press Escape to cancel.

add_panel.message:
Adding a panel….

Drop anywhere in the page to add it, or press Escape to cancel.

moving.message:
Moving…

Drop anywhere in the page or cancel with the Escape key.

not_link.message:
Not a link or URL.

Only links can be imported from other pages.

locked_moved_to_trash.message:
Moved.

Your item is now in the trash.

showBookmarksSidebar.message: Include a sidebar of most recent bookmarks.

hideBookmarksInPage.message: Omit bookmarks that are already in the page.

showBookmarksLimit.message: Number of recent bookmarks to show.

showToolTips.message: Show helpful tooltips when hovering over things.

showToast.message: Time (in seconds) each feedback message is shown. Setting this to zero will disable messages.

lock.message: Lock page.  When locked, no drags can occur and no new links can be added.

text_export.message: Export a backup file of your current start tabs.

text_import.message:
Import a previously backed-up file to restore it.

You can also drop an exported file here.

Caution: Importing will replace all existing tabs.

add_panel_auto.message:
Add panel.

You have added a panel. It is at the bottom.

editOnNewDrop.message: Open edit dialogue after create and drop new panel/link

reset_page.message: Reset the page to the default value

suggest_backup.message: Do you want to make a backup ?

allow_collapsing_locked.message: Allow collapsing and opening of panels when page is locked

save_panel_status_locked.message: Remember status of panel (open/collapsed) when the page is locked
